welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rehovot! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and world-renowned scientific institutions. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Rehovot has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, expected to open in 2022 and serve as the main terminal for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code from the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Sde Dov Airport caters to high-profile and business travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
